EmailTemplate.subject: Recording Link and Handouts for "EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform" Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for Your Interest EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for joining us for our webinar: EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform
We hope you found the information useful and would love to hear additional ideas on topics that you would be interested in hearing. Simply email cheri.lane@tritech.com with your ideas.
You can access the recording and presentation slides from the webinar using these links:
Recorded Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/bfjswyc
PDF Handout link: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/April26Webinar.pdf
Thank you, TriTech Software Systems
MORE INFORMATION Your time is valuable, thanks for attending:
NAAC CEU Certificate Link:
Want to see more? Check out other educational webinars here: http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
